# aea.crypto.base

Abstract module wrapping the public and private key cryptography and ledger api.

<a id="aea.crypto.base.Crypto"></a>

## Crypto Objects

```python
class Crypto(Generic[EntityClass], ABC)
```

Base class for a crypto object.
